text: Ezɨ ensel ghua kamaghɨn Daniel mɨgei, “Eghtɨ gɨn atrivir tam Sirian kantrin otogh, egh an araziba bar ikuvigham. Gumazir kam, Sirian gumazamizibar ifongiamɨn atrivimɨn otoghan kogham, a uan nɨghnɨzimɨn atrivimɨn otogham. Egh a zuamɨra otogh akar asuibav kɨmɨva akar ifavaribar amu, egh Sirian atrivimɨn ikiam.
